img_above_text:
![Wukong Mindcliff 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b6/Wukong_Mindcliff_9.jpg)
Before giving chase, there's a very important secret he's trying to lead you away from! Head out onto the ledge past where you fought him, and you'll find a green Wisp to absorb.
img_below_text:
It might not look like it, but you can actually fall down a ledge below this spot, and you can then spy a trail of ledges leading down to a fallen pillar with another green Wisp along the middle, meaning you can actually cross it!
![Wukong Mindcliff 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/36/Wukong_Mindcliff_11.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 10 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Mindcliff 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b6/Wukong_Mindcliff_9.jpg)
Before giving chase, there's a very important secret he's trying to lead you away from! Head out onto the ledge past where you fought him, and you'll find a green Wisp to absorb."
            - Following Text: "It might not look like it, but you can actually fall down a ledge below this spot, and you can then spy a trail of ledges leading down to a fallen pillar with another green Wisp along the middle, meaning you can actually cross it!
![Wukong Mindcliff 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/36/Wukong_Mindcliff_11.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character is positioned on a ledge overlooking a lower area. The image highlights a hidden path that can be accessed by falling down to a lower ledge, which leads to a fallen pillar. A green Wisp, an important collectible in the game, is visible along this path, indicating a secret area that the player is encouraged to explore.
